cards.title: Theif
powers: Reveal the top 2 cards of your deck. Play one and discard the other.
incapacitatedAbilities: One hero discards the top 2 cards of their deck.
One hero puts an equipment card from their trash into play.

cards.title: Debilitating Strike
body: The first time each turn {Thief} deals damage to a non-hero target, increase damage hero sources deal to that target by 1 until the start of {Thief}'s next turn.

cards.title: Hindering Strike
body: The first time each turn {Thief} deals damage to a non-hero target, decrease damage dealt by that target by 1 until the start of {Theif}'s next turn.

cards.title: Chain Strike
body: The first time each turn {Thief} deals damage to a non-hero target, if it is not {Thief}'s turn, you may play a card.

cards.title: Pickpocket
body: The first time each turn {Thief} deals damage to a non-hero target, draw a card.

cards.title: Backstab
body: Whenever thief deals damage during a turn other than her own, increase that damage by 2.

cards.title: Opportunist
body: When a hero character deals damage to a villain target, you may destroy this card. If you do, {Theif} deals that target 1 melee damage.

cards.title: Improvised Trap
body: When a target enters play, you may destroy this card. If you do, {Thief} deals 3 projectile damage to that target

cards.title: Tripwire
body: When a target enters play, {Thief} deals it 1 projectile damage.

cards.title: Spring Knife
body: When a villain card is played, destroy this card. If you do, {Thief} deals the villain character 2 damage.

cards.title: Pocket Sand
body: When a villain target enters play, destroy this card. That target cannot deal damage until the start of {Thief}'s next turn.

cards.title: Trapmaster
body: At the end of your turn, you may play a Trap card from your hand or discard pile.

cards.title: Counterstrike
body: The first time a target damages {Thief} each turn, {Thief} deals that target 1 melee damage.

cards.title: Sucker Punch
body: At the start of the villain turn, {Thief} deals the villain target with the lowest HP 1 melee damage.

cards.title: Trapspotting
body: When an environment target enters play, you may use a power.

cards.title: Throwing Knives
powers: {Thief} deals up to three targets 1 projetile damage.

cards.title: Flury of Blades
body: {Thief} deals each non-hero target 1 melee damage.
